import './Dashboard.css' import Schedule from './Components/Schedule' import Persona from './Components/Persona' import Calendly from './Components/Calendly'; import Ref from './Components/Ref' import React, {useState} from 'react' function Dashboard(props) { const [calendar, setCalendar] = useState("") const [who, setWho] = useState("") const [web, setWeb] = useState("") const [open, setOpen] = useState("not-active") function changeWho(event){ event.preventDefault() setWho(event.target.value) } function changeWeb(event){ event.preventDefault() setWeb(event.target.value) } function changeCalendar(event){ event.preventDefault() setCalendar(event.target.value) } function handleSubmit(event){ // window.alert(event) event.preventDefault() console.log(who) } return (

Customer Interviews

Welcome {props.name}

Your email is {props.email}









Interview Request

To schedule an interview please use the form below



Calender Link



Your website URL



Who are you looking to interview

); } export default Dashboard;
